title: 134: Episode #134: What The Bleep?
itunes:title: Episode #134: What The Bleep?
description:
• A slip-up on last week’s show gets a lot of feedback. We respond.
  • The Top 5 contestants for Micah’s News Contest!
  • It’s a new month so vote for us on Podcast Alley!
  • Help Mason raise money for the American Cancer Society.
  • Listener Rebuttals take a look at cashing in, The Last Enemy, and Make the Music Connection.
  • Chapter by Chapter covers Chapters 18 and 19.
  • We have an in-depth discussion on Dumbledore and Grindelwald’s relationship.
  • Why is the sword at the bottom of the pond?
  • Matt gets angry at Snape’s sword placement.
  • Laura justifies Hermione’s anger at Ron when he returns.
  • Make the Music Connection returns!
  • A new segment: Hold Up, Hosts!
  • Chicken Soup.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
